resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105985</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105985</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087225</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What Is It? How Far is It?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was Ist Es? Ist wie weit es?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qu'est-ce que c'est ? À quelle distance 
est-il ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que É Ele? Está como distante?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa È Esso? Fin dove è?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τι είναι αυτό; Πόσο μακριά είναι;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál Es Él? ¿Está cómo lejos?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For each of the celestial objects on this page, write down what type of object it is and how far it is.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für jede der himmlischen Nachrichten auf dieser Seite, 
notieren Sie, welcher Typ der Nachricht es ist und wie weit es ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour chacun des objets célestes à cette page, notez quel
type d'objet c'est et à quelle distance il est.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para cada um dos objetos celestiais nesta página, escreva
para baixo que tipo de objeto é e como distante está.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per ciascuno degli oggetti celesti a questa pagina, annoti
che tipo di oggetto è e quanto lontano è.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για κάθε ένα από τα ουράνια αντικείμενα σε αυτήν την
σελίδα, γράψτε κάτω ποιος τύπος αντικειμένου είναι και πόσο 
μακριά είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para cada uno de los objetos celestiales en esta 
paginación, anote qué tipo de objeto es y cómo está lejos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087225</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105985</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/what-is-it-how-far-is-it</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
